characters.name: Takuro Sugawara
characters.description: In class 2-4 and a member of the soccer club.

characters.name: Masafumi Akagi
characters.description:
He is a straightforward dominant boy and is the student council president. He is in class 3-8.
~!He starts dating Ryouko Kaji because he fears that she would be willing to do it with any man if they asked. He also thinks she's cute.!~

characters.name: Yuki Minagawa
characters.description:
She is a friendly girl from class 2-1 and is both the female class representative and a member of the soft tennis club. She likes teasing people.
~!She likes Jun Furuya and enjoys teasing him by telling him she likes him. She also finds his little sister adorable.!~

characters.name: Shinichi Katori
characters.description:
He is a spontaneous boy who appears whenever love advice is needed. He is from class 3-5 and is the president of the drama club. Shinichi is a quirky and upbeat teenager. He tends to speak in short English phrases at times; he also tends to be a playboy around girls (though he may not be aware how much it affects their feelings) and even calls himself a "Dating Master" and "Love Master", much to everyone's annoyance and amazement.

~!In a later chapter, it is revealed that Shinichi has been fighting an illness that causes him to cough up blood. Because of this, he has been repeating years at high school. So many times in fact, that he originally attended high school even before the current third years began high school.!~

characters.name: Takeru Gouda
characters.description:
A muscular boy with few expressions who is from class 2-4 and is in the volleyball club.
~!He eventually starts dating Ayaka Kamine and suffers to act mature in front of her.!~

characters.name: Chiaki Uchimura
characters.description:
He's a friendly boy from class 2-4 and is not a member of any school clubs.
~!He will date Kana Ijima throughout the manga and will have many issues regarding their physical attraction.!~

characters.name: Chizuru Takano
characters.description:
She is seemingly emotionless girl from class 2-4 and is a member of the wind instruments club. She says she has no interest in love because she doesn't understand it.
~!She will start to have strange emotions towards her classmate Sugawara.!~

characters.name: Ayaka Kamine
characters.description:
She is a shy timid girl from class 2-4 and is a member of the tea ceremony club.
~!She is in love with Takeru Gouda and becomes his girlfriend throughout the manga.!~

characters.name: Ryouko Kaji
characters.description:
She is delinquent from class 3-8 and often smokes behind the school.
~!She eventually dates Masafumi Akagi after he confessed to her.!~

characters.name: Kana Ijima
characters.description:
She is a tsundere girl who likes football. She is from class 2-4 and is not in any club.
~!She has issues with her boyfriend, Chiaki Uchimura, when it comes to physical intimacy.!~

characters.name: Kazuko Hosogawa
characters.description:
She a normal girl that people often ask her for love advice although she feels annoyed by this because she doesn't have any love experience.
~!She fell in love with Shinichi Katori after she saw him save a cat from a tree.!~

characters.name: Jun Furuya
characters.description:
A dedicated student who is the male class representative for class 2-1 and is also in the broadcasting club.
~!He has a crush on Yuki Minagawa although he gets annoyed when she teases him.~!
~!He confesses his love for her in chapter 82.!~

characters.name: Chiyo Kurihara
characters.description: In class 2-1 and the cooking club.

characters.name: Haruhiko Takase
characters.description: In class 2-1 and the soccer club.

characters.name: Takao Yamane
characters.description:
He is an otaku with low self confidence from class 2-7. 
~!He likes Chiyo Kurihara but believes shes out of his league for them to be a couple.!~
